entry.title: Nat
entry.content:
iptables --table nat --append POSTROUTING --out-interface eth1 -j MASQUERADE
iptables --append FORWARD --in-interface eth0 -j ACCEPT
echo "1" > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/ip_forward

entry.title: QR-code
entry.content:
qrencode

apt-get install qrencode
cat tmp.text | qrencode -s 10 -o tmp.png

zbarimg

apt-get install zbar-tools
zbarimg tmp.png

entry.title: 自定網址
Counter-cache
entry.content: $rails g migration add_votes_to_store

entry.title: 排列目錄空間大小
entry.content: du -h --max-depth=1 -x /home | sort -n

entry.title: 硬碟速度測試
entry.content:
dd if=/dev/zero of=test_disk bs=1k count=1000000
dd if=test_disk of=/dev/null bs=2k
rm test_disk

entry.title: Route
entry.content:
@echo off
route delete 0.0.0.0
route add 0.0.0.0 192.168.43.1 mask 0.0.0.0
route print | find "0.0.0.0"
ping 127.0.0.1 -n 10 > nul

entry.title: Base64
Youtube-dl
entry.content:
install

apt-get install youtube-dl

mp3

youtube-dl –extract-audio –audio-format mp3 url

video

youtube-dl -f mp4 url
